problem_text_cn: 如图,△A′B′C′和△ABC是以点O为位似中心的位似图形,若位似比A′O:AO=3:1,且△A′B′C′的周长是12,则△ABC的周长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, △A′B′C′ and △ABC are the similarity figures with vertex O as the similarity center. If the positional similarity ratio is A′O:AO = N_0:N_1, and the perimeter of △A′B′C′ is N_2, then the perimeter of △ABC is ()
raw_answer:
解:∵△A′B′C′和△ABC是以点O为位似中心的位似图形,位似比A′O:AO=3:1,∴△A′B′C′和△ABC的周长比为:3:1,∵△A′B′C′的周长是12,∴△ABC的周长是:4．
故选:A．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了位似变换,正确得出△A′B′C′和△ABC的周长比是解题关键．
